title: Watch face - Magician Pro
summary: Nearly 1000 unique and special styles you could create with this watch face !
description: Features:-Nearly 1000 unique and special styles you could create with it !-6 preset watch face combinations, every day starts from a new face.-15 markers, ranging from dots to numbers, each one is unique and elegant.-8 clock hands, classic or modern, sharp-pointed or round-pointed.-7 bright colors for clock hands, cool tone VS. warm tone.-7 individual functions, step counter, temperature, watch battery, moon phase, week, weather and day of month.-4 indicators to choose functions, customize your own style.-You can set daily step goals and change temperature scale(Fahrenheit or Celsius).-Support both round and square Android Wear smart watches.More facesIf you like Magician, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face  to find more of our works.Supported Devices:Magician supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.About us:We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Website:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
descriptionHTML:
Features:

-Nearly 1000 unique and special styles you could create with it !

-6 preset watch face combinations, every day starts from a new face.

-15 markers, ranging from dots to numbers, each one is unique and elegant.

-8 clock hands, classic or modern, sharp-pointed or round-pointed.

-7 bright colors for clock hands, cool tone VS. warm tone.

-7 individual functions, step counter, temperature, watch battery, moon phase, week, weather and day of month.

-4 indicators to choose functions, customize your own style.

-You can set daily step goals and change temperature scale(Fahrenheit or Celsius).

-Support both round and square Android Wear smart watches.


More faces
If you like Magician, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices:
Magician supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About us:
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809

Website:
http://www.magicwatchface.com/

Twitter：
https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
comments: [No longer updated.] Well-designed customizations and battery-efficient. Wrong time. [Update: Abandonware. Replaced by "Magic Watch Face."] I love the design aesthetics of this watchface. And it has just enough customizations to make it feel personalized. Importantly, on my Gear Live, battery life is exemplary with this watchface. Unfortunately, the transition animation between active and ambient screens doesn't always finish, so about 20% of the time, the ambient screen displays the wrong time. So as a watch, this watchface fails.
Great Foundation With Potential I think the DEV team hit a home run with the base app. My guess is that more great features and functionality will be introduced on top of the existing base.

Well done Awesome watchfaces. Clean and neat. Pity there is no month function dial. Also would be great to allow the function dials to be made resizable. Also drop the full stop in the day of week function. Then it will be great.
Misleading I got to be honest I thought that the faces on the front advert come with the price. They do not and I was gutted.
Best face I've found so far All watch faces should work like this. Love the ability to switch it up. Would love to be able to change the size of the features, they're a butt small
Difficulty No Option to change temperature from Fahrenheit to Celsius.
